title: Convenient Scotland Stay in Aberdeen Airport near City Centre
description: Ideally positioned a short walk from the terminal, Crowne Plaza Aberdeen Airport, an IHG Hotel, is perfect for a convenient stay in this historic Scottish port city. Take the free shuttle to Dyce Station, where a train will whisk you into the city in 10 minutes, and discover intriguing museums, gorgeous architecture, and a range of dining options. For a change of pace, check out the Royal Aberdeen Golf Club 15 minutes from your hotel, or indulge in sophisticated whiskies at the nearby Glen Garioch Distillery.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Aberdeen Airport, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 2 International Gate Dyce, Aberdeen AB21 0BE, United Kingdom

title: UK: Aberdeen Urban Retreat Minutes from Airport & City Centre
description: Conveniently close to the airport, Holiday Inn Aberdeen - West, an IHG Hotel offers a modern and comfortable stay only minutes from the city.
